title: @RiotStashu Yea but what if we don't Cassiopeia's stacking passive
body:
This rework shoved a new gameplay down our throats without our consent.
Why can't you rework her and keep her similar to her old self?
We never wanted that stacking passive
We never saw her as a late game champion
You told us that if we don't want the passive you will remove it, let's see if you're true with your words

replies.body: If we're changing the passive then can we get back the original ratios on our abilities?

If they don't want her "oppressive" poison damage, and we don't want that shitty stacking passive
There should be more than just number changes.

He said if they can't get the passive to work out they'd consider changing it (and he went on to say he's pretty sure they can make it work out). He never said that if we didn't like the passive he would remove it.

"We won't keep something that is ultimately disliked"
-Stashu

Okay, before I vote...


"Different Passive" is referring to her current "new Passive" that is different from her...admittedly boring old mana Passive (still better than stacking though!)?


Or does "Different" Passive refer to something different than what we currently have now?

The new passive is awful, but I don't believe stashu for one minute, only actions will make me believe. Too bad after all this time, people have started to roll over and accept it, and voyboy played her once so all the esports drones will staunchly defend her as being super good. 

Here's hoping we can have enough people who still want to fight the good fight to make stashu see that we don't want this crap passive, and the ratio slashing that occurred for it.
Your poll is not very clear, wether you talk about the old - or the live passive.

I meant live passive
past is in the past
This vote is skewed completely. The people against the rework are the minority, but they seem like the majority because those happy with the rework have no reason to be here complaining.
Then how do you know most people are happy with the rework if they aren't making their voice heard?  Because it fits your agenda?

> Then how do you know most people are happy with the rework if they aren't making their voice heard?  Because it fits your agenda?




You are aware this same line of thought applies to you as well right?  A lot of people that play the new Cassio don't come here to talk about her.  There are however reddit threads about her that do actually have far more people in them than any cass there on these boards and there is far more positivity towards her than negativity over there.
